entities.description: text is a type of node in the tree structure  representing a block of textual content
section is a type of node in the tree structure  representing a hierarchical section with a determined level
table is a type of node in the tree structure  representing a block of tabular content
image is a type of node in the tree structure  representing a block of image content

relations.description: both section and text are node types in the definitive tree structure t
both section and table are node types in the definitive tree structure t
both section and image are node types in the definitive tree structure t
both text and table are node types in the definitive tree structure t
both text and image are node types in the definitive tree structure t
both table and image are node types in the definitive tree structure t
